name: Gwen Bartonek
coverLetter:
I have helped several friends trim over the years, but it is something that I have never done on a regular basis. I have a degree in horticulture and have plant nursery experience. I am fast and efficient. 

I require a legal and safe environment in which to work. I prefer to work with other females. I would like to work in Clackamas County area and work approx 6 hrs/day. I am available Oct-Nov.
